data.title: Shanna Moakler Claims She Doesnt Speak To Travis Barker After He Ruined Her Relationship With The
data.meta_description: Shanna Moakler gave an honest update about where she stands with Travis Barker, whom she shares two children with. The former reality star has admitted their co-parenting relationship has become strained since he started dating Kourtney Kardashian, who he wed in 2022. But based on her recent comments, it doesnt sound like much has improved.
data.text:
Highlights

Shanna Moakler unfolded about strained co-parenting with Travis Barker post-Kourtney Kardashian relationship.

The former couple's relationship hit a coarse patch post-divorce, with little hope for conversation now.

Shanna is interested in therapeutic from her contemporary losses and finding her position on this planet as an empty nester.

Shanna Moakler gave an honest replace about the place she stands with Travis Barker, whom she stocks two youngsters with. The former fact famous person has admitted their co-parenting relationship has become strained since he began courting Kourtney Kardashian, who he wed in 2022. But in response to her contemporary comments, it doesnât sound like much has stepped forward.

I donât feel find it irresistibleâll be like that eternally, but I believe like at this time â I feel thatâs where we are at in our evolution, and perhaps one day, itâll exchange.â

When requested if she believes they might get again to speaking terms, Shanna made a blanket remark about her past partners, saying she âjustâ doesnât âcare about her exes nowadays.â

âI know Iâm speaking about it right here with you â and I in reality canât do anything else without talking about it â as itâs simply kind of caught with me, which is fine,â she went on, prior to referencing the demise of her parents, which happened last year. Shanna admitted sheâs focused on therapeutic from her loss.

âBut I truly care more about just healing from the lack of my family and my toughen device, and just in point of fact making an attempt to to find out what my next transfer in lifestyles is,â she defined. âIâm an empty nester and turning 50, and Iâm just trying to find my place on this planet once more without my parents or a partner.â

Travis And Shanna Have Had Conflict For Years

Close

Travis and Shanna first crossed paths in early 2002. Their whirlwind romance temporarily improved, and so they had been married through 2004. The couple welcomed two kids all the way through their marriage: a son, Landon, born in 2003, and a daughter, Alabama, born in 2005.

Additionally, Barker was once a stepfather to Moakler's daughter, Atiana, from her previous relationship with boxer Oscar De La Hoya.

Their relationship was thrust into the general public eye through their fact TV show, Meet the Barkers, which aired on MTV. The display ran for 2 seasons from April 2005 to February 2006, giving audiences an within take a look at their family lifestyles and the dynamics of their marriage.

Shanna Moakler hasn't had as illustrious a career as her ex, and her internet value is nowhere close to his.

Despite the plain glamour, the show additionally hinted at underlying tensions and conflicts inside the relationship. The couple's marriage started to get to the bottom of, main to their separation in 2006. They filed for divorce in August of that year, and it was finalized in 2008.

Since their divorce, each Barker and Moakler have moved on to new relationships. Shanna has been related to various companions, whilst Barker's romantic life took an important turn in 2021 when he started relationship Kourtney Kardashian. Theyâre now married and welcomed a son remaining fall. Unfortunately, Shanna has hinted that the coupleâs relationship has caused tension between her and her kids, admitting she canât keep up with the Kardashianâs lavish lifestyle.
